actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to expand the availability of coverage for lung cancer screenings without the imposition of cost sharing.
short_title: Katherineâ€™s Lung Cancer Early Detection and Survival Act of 2021

summary.text:
Katherine's Lung Cancer Early Detection and Survival Act of 2021

This bill requires private health insurance plans to cover, without cost sharing, screenings for the detection of lung cancer for certain high-risk individuals.
